skills.title: Skills
skills.html5: The standar HTML5 markup languaje. I have Medium-high level to be able to build a large number of web pages.
skills.css: The graphic design language in cascading to define and create a web page.
skills.javascript: This language add the functionality to the web page. Requires logic and lateral think.
skills.react: The JavaScript Framework created by Facebook. Im constantly learnig from this framework. This is one of my favorites.
skills.strapi: Strapi is the next-gen headless CMS, open-source, javascript, enabling content-​rich experiences to be created, managed and exposed to any digital device.
skills.bootstrap: CSS framework for responsive web design. Also right now im learning Chakra UI for React
skills.firebase: Google application development platform that helps you build, improve, and grow your app
skills.github: Github is a web-based platform used for version control. Git simplifies the process of working with other people and makes it easy to collaborate on projects.

about.title: About
about.description: Hi there! I am Lautaro Nasello, I am 23 years old and I live in Córdoba, Argentina. I love developing web applications! I also study Psychology at UNC. Sometimes my curiosity leads me to learn too many things which can be good or bad. I am interested in taking risks to improve my day to day. Applying the notions of this discipline helps me to create more intuitive and innovative products. I am interested in challenges and learning new things.
